# showsMapTypeControl

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether to display a control that lets users choose the map type.

## Declaration

```swift
get showsMapTypeControl(): boolean;
set showsMapTypeControl(showsMapTypeControl: boolean);
```

## Discussion

The map type control enables users to select whether to show a standard, satellite, or hybrid map view.

## Showing the map’s controls

- **showsCompass**: A feature visibility setting that determines when the compass is visible.
- **showsScale**: A feature visibility setting that determines when the map displays the map’s scale indicator.
- **showsUserLocationControl**: A Boolean value that determines whether the user location control is visible.
- **showsZoomControl**: A Boolean value that determines whether to display a control for zooming in and zooming out on a map.
